locations.name: Ubud
locations.description: The spiritual and cultural heart of Bali, known for its lush rice paddies, traditional crafts, ancient temples, and focus on wellness.

locations.name: Uluwatu
locations.description: Located on Bali's southern Bukit Peninsula, famous for its dramatic cliff-top temple, stunning ocean views, world-class surf breaks, and spectacular sunsets.

locations.name: Lombok
locations.description: An island east of Bali offering a more tranquil atmosphere, beautiful beaches (like Senggigi, represented by these coordinates), clear waters, and access to the Gili Islands. The coordinates point towards the Senggigi area, a popular tourist hub fitting the description.
